pullrequest.title: Install server fixture for use outside of gazebo.

content.raw:
Setup:

gazebo branch: install_server_fixture

Gazebo installed to `~/local`

No Gazebo debians installed

~/local/bin is on `PATH`

~/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu is on `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`

Also, `libgtest-dev` 1.6.0 is installed from debians.

I tried manually adding the build directory of the `test_fixture` example to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`, since it contains `libgtest_main.a`, but it didn't seem to fix anything. Building it on my laptop now to see if I get better results.
content.html:
Setup:

gazebo branch: install_server_fixture

Gazebo installed to ~/local

No Gazebo debians installed

~/local/bin is on PATH

~/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu is on LD_LIBRARY_PATH

Also, libgtest-dev 1.6.0 is installed from debians.

I tried manually adding the build directory of the test_fixture example to LD_LIBRARY_PATH, since it contains libgtest_main.a, but it didn't seem to fix anything. Building it on my laptop now to see if I get better results.
